hero.heading: Welcome to the DocuIntelli AI Closed Beta
hero.subheading: You're one of a small group of people getting early access before we launch publicly. We built this for people like you — and we need your honest feedback to make it great.

productOverview.heading: What is DocuIntelli AI?
productOverview.description: Your intelligent document companion. Store, understand, and manage all your important legal and financial documents — warranties, insurance policies, leases, employment contracts, and more — in one secure, AI-powered vault.

features.title: Secure Document Vault
features.description: Upload PDFs, Word docs, images, and URLs. Everything encrypted and organized by category.

features.title: AI-Powered Chat
features.description: Ask questions about your documents in plain English. "What's my deductible?" — instant answers.

features.title: Smart Reminders
features.description: Never miss an expiration date. Get alerts before warranties and policies lapse.

gettingStarted.heading: Getting Started in 3 Minutes
gettingStarted.subheading: Follow these steps to explore DocuIntelli AI.
gettingStarted.ctaButton: Get Started — Create Your Beta Account

steps.title: Create Your Account
steps.description: Click "Get Started" below to create a free account. You can sign up with your email or Google account.

steps.title: Upload a Document
steps.description: Try uploading a real document — a warranty, insurance card, lease, or any PDF/image you have handy. The AI will process it automatically.

steps.title: Chat With Your Document
steps.description: Once processed, open the document and ask a question. Try: "Summarize this document" or "When does this expire?"

steps.title: Test a Paid Plan (Optional)
steps.description: Want to test Starter ($7/mo) or Pro ($19/mo) features? Use the test credit card info below — you will NOT be charged real money.

testPayment.heading: Test Credit Card — No Real Charges

warning.title: This is a test environment
warning.description: No real money will be charged. Use the card details below to test paid plan features. All transactions are in Stripe test mode.

testPayment.footnote: After subscribing with a test card, you can test upgrading, downgrading, and canceling from the Billing page — all without any real charges.

testingChecklist.heading: What to Test
testingChecklist.subheading: Here's what we'd love for you to try. You don't need to test everything — even trying 2–3 things is incredibly helpful.

items.label: Sign up
items.detail: Create an account with email or Google

items.label: Upload a document
items.detail: Try a PDF, Word doc, or image

items.label: Chat with a document
items.detail: Ask it a question after processing

items.label: Set an expiration date
items.detail: Edit a document and add one

items.label: Search & filter
items.detail: Try searching by name, category, or tags

items.label: View on mobile
items.detail: Open the app on your phone and try navigating

items.label: Upgrade to Starter or Pro
items.detail: Use the test card below

items.label: Upload a URL
items.detail: Paste a web page URL to ingest (Starter+)

items.label: Check auto-generated tags
items.detail: Upload a doc and see if tags appear (Starter+)

items.label: Weekly Audit page
items.detail: View your document audit summary (Starter+)

items.label: Life Events planner
items.detail: Plan a life event and see readiness (Pro)

items.label: Document Health panel
items.detail: Check your dashboard health panel (Pro)

items.label: Downgrade / Cancel
items.detail: Try downgrading or canceling from Billing page

items.label: View Billing page
items.detail: Check subscription details

items.label: Update profile
items.detail: Change display name or notification preferences

items.label: Account Settings
items.detail: Explore notification and email preferences

feedbackExpectations.heading: Your Feedback Matters
feedbackExpectations.subheading: We're not looking for polished reviews. We want raw, honest reactions.

categories.title: Bugs & Broken Things
categories.description: Did something crash? Did a button not work? Did the AI give a weird answer? Tell us exactly what happened.

categories.title: Confusing Moments
categories.description: Was anything unclear? Did you get lost? Did you expect something to work differently? These "huh?" moments are gold.

categories.title: What You Loved
categories.description: What felt good? What was surprisingly useful? What would make you come back? Positive feedback helps us double down.

items.label: Processing time
items.detail: Document processing (AI analysis) may take 30–60 seconds. This will be faster at launch.

items.label: Mobile layout
items.detail: Some screens may not be fully optimized for small screens yet. We're working on it.

items.label: Email notifications
items.detail: Notification emails may land in spam. Check your spam folder or whitelist noreply@docuintelli.com.

items.label: Occasional AI hiccups
items.detail: The AI may occasionally give incomplete or slightly off answers. That's part of what we're testing.

items.label: Test environment
items.detail: Data in this environment may be reset periodically. Don't store anything critical here.

feedbackChannels.heading: How to Share Your Feedback
feedbackChannels.subheading: No feedback is too small. Even "this color looks weird" or "I don't understand what this button does" is useful.

channels.title: WhatsApp
channels.description: Text me directly — voice notes welcome too!

channels.title: Email
channels.description: Send detailed feedback or attach screenshots.

channels.title: Screenshots & Recordings
channels.description: A screenshot or quick screen recording tells us more than words.

footerCta.heading: Ready to explore?
footerCta.subheading: Create your account and start testing DocuIntelli AI today.
footerCta.thankYou: Thank you for helping us build something great.
